sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { bindActionCreators } from 'redux'; import { incrementNumberOfRequestsMade, getWeatherData} from './actions' class App extends Component { render() { return (
Show weather:
Selected City: Selected City
Weather in Selected City:
Number of requests made:
); } } /* mapDispatchToProps Allows us to pass the dispatch methods as callbacks via props into our view layer. */ const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { actions: bindActionCreators({ incrementNumberOfRequestsMade, getWeatherData, }, dispatch) }; }; /* mapStateToProps Allows us to pass application state as read-only props to our component */ const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { isFetching: state.reducer.expressionTypesToPrettyMap, weatherSummary: state.reducer.expressionTypesToPrettyMap, expressionTypesToCondensedMap: state.cEditorReducer.expressionTypesToCondensedMap, expressionComponentsMetadata: state.cEditorReducer.expressionComponentsMetadata, allExpressionTypes: state.cEditorReducer.allExpressionTypes, numberExpressionTypes: state.cEditorReducer.numberExpressionTypes, emptyExpression: state.cEditorReducer.emptyExpression, allColDefs: state.cEditorReducer.allColDefs, fetchedInitConfig: state.cEditorReducer.fetchedInitConfig, latestIrisEngineResponse: state.cEditorReducer.latestIrisEngineResponse, historyHtml: state.cEditorReducer.historyHtml, gridOverlayLoadingTemplate: state.cEditorReducer.gridOverlayLoadingTemplate, gridOverlayNoRowsTemplate: state.cEditorReducer.gridOverlayNoRowsTemplate, createExpressionEngineResponse: state.cEditorReducer.createExpressionEngineResponse, modelName: state.cEditorReducer.modelName, shouldMakeCallToGetLatestJuice: state.cEditorReducer.shouldMakeCallToGetLatestJuice, fetchedLatestJuice: state.cEditorReducer.fetchedLatestJuice, libraryJuiceExpressionSections: state.cEditorReducer.libraryJuiceExpressionSections, resultsColDefs: state.cEditorReducer.resultsColDefs, resultsRowData: state.cEditorReducer.resultsRowData, modelMetaDataInformation: state.cEditorReducer.modelMetaDataInformation, irisEngineResponseModalWrapperStyle: state.cEditorReducer.irisEngineResponseModalWrapperStyle, windowWrapperBehindIrisEngineResponseModalWrapperStyle: state.cEditorReducer.windowWrapperBehindIrisEngineResponseModalWrapperStyle, dataTableSampleSidePanelModalStyle: state.cEditorReducer.dataTableSampleSidePanelModalStyle, windowWrapperBehindDataTableSampleSidePanelModalStyle: state.cEditorReducer.windowWrapperBehindDataTableSampleSidePanelModalStyle, modelHistoryInfoModalWrapperStyle: state.cEditorReducer.modelHistoryInfoModalWrapperStyle, windowWrapperBehindModelHistoryInfoModalWrapperStyle: state.cEditorReducer.windowWrapperBehindModelHistoryInfoModalWrapperStyle, modelHistoryMarkdown: state.cEditorReducer.modelHistoryMarkdown, // helpers defaultExpressions: state.cEditorReducer.defaultExpressions, createInitialValuesHelperConfig: state.cEditorReducer.createInitialValuesHelperConfig, createInitialArraysHelperConfig: state.cEditorReducer.createInitialArraysHelperConfig, createProjectionRuleHelperConfig: state.cEditorReducer.createProjectionRuleHelperConfig, dataHelperConfig: state.cEditorReducer.dataHelperConfig, // config for Edit Expression Modal Window editExpressionInitialValueConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editExpressionInitialValueConfig, editExpressionInitialArrayConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editExpressionInitialArrayConfig, editExpressionProjectionRuleConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editExpressionProjectionRuleConfig, editExpressionDataSourceConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editExpressionDataSourceConfig, editExpressionConditionRuleConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editExpressionConditionRuleConfig, editExpressionAnniversaryConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editExpressionAnniversaryConfig, editExpressionShockConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editExpressionShockConfig, editExpressionSystemConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editExpressionSystemConfig, editExpressionTransformationConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editExpressionTransformationConfig, editNCfTransactionConfig: state.cEditorReducer.editNCfTransactionConfig, tableDataColumnDefinition1: state.cEditorReducer.tableDataColumnDefinition1, tableDataColumnDefinition2: state.cEditorReducer.tableDataColumnDefinition2, tableDataColumnDefinition3: state.cEditorReducer.tableDataColumnDefinition3, tableDataRowDataA: state.cEditorReducer.tableDataRowDataA, tableDataRowDataB: state.cEditorReducer.tableDataRowDataB, tableDataRowDataC: state.cEditorReducer.tableDataRowDataC, fetchedLatestTableDataForDataHelper: state.cEditorReducer.fetchedLatestTableDataForDataHelper, sampleResultsColDefs: state.cEditorReducer.sampleResultsColDefs, sampleResultsRowData: state.cEditorReducer.sampleResultsRowData, fetchingResults: state.cEditorReducer.fetchingResults, initialValuesNames: state.cEditorReducer.initialValuesNames, initialArraysNames: state.cEditorReducer.initialArraysNames, anniversaryRulesNames: state.cEditorReducer.anniversaryRulesNames, conditionRulesNames: state.cEditorReducer.conditionRulesNames, transformationsNames: state.cEditorReducer.transformationsNames, areaNames: state.cEditorReducer.areaNames, // Formula Builder // initialValuesFormulaBuilderRowData: state.cEditorReducer.initialValuesFormulaBuilderRowData, // conditionsValuesFormulaBuilderRow: state.cEditorReducer.conditionsValuesFormulaBuilderRow, // systemVarsForFormulaBuilderRowData: state.cEditorReducer.systemVarsForFormulaBuilderRowData, headerBarShowing: state.headerBarReducer.headerBarShowing, timestamp: state.cEditorReducer.timestamp, runModelButtonEnabled: state.cEditorReducer.runModelButtonEnabled, buildModelButtonEnabled: state.cEditorReducer.buildModelButtonEnabled, showModelManuallyRefreshedAlert: state.cEditorReducer.showModelManuallyRefreshedAlert, showOpenedCurrentModelLocationAlert: state.cEditorReducer.showOpenedCurrentModelLocationAlert, irisEngineInfoModalShowing: state.cEditorReducer.irisEngineInfoModalShowing, dataSampleSidePanelShowing: state.cEditorReducer.dataSampleSidePanelShowing, // allExpressionsInJuice: state.cEditorReducer.allExpressionsInJuice, areasViewColDefs: state.cEditorReducer.areasViewColDefs, deletedExpressionComplete: state.cEditorReducer.deletedExpressionComplete }; }; export default connect( mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps )(App);
